episodes.title: Pastor Quiboloy faces multiple criminal charges (with English subs) | Kapuso Mo, Jessica Soho
episodes.description:
Aired (September 15, 2024): WARNING: This video contains sensitive content.

Apollo Quiboloy, leader of the Kingdom of Jesus Christ and known televangelist, is now in police custody, facing grace accusations from former members-- including sexual abuse, money laundering, and human trafficking.
Watch the full special report.
